title: Ticket #2750: Fix clang and other warning from MacOS build
description:
All the cool platforms are doing it, let's set -Werror on Mac OS X.

Patch to come. Needs review.
remarks:
2012-Jan-09 11:19:39 by gthain:
Brian: if I apply this patch, the condor_master segfaults on starts up macos. I don't have a gdb handy on my mac platform -- are you sure this is the full diff?

2012-Jan-09 11:40:07 by bbockelm:
I think it's the full diff, but not quite ready. Give me some time to debug and I'll bump the ticket when I figure out the issue.

My dev environment is 10.6; what is NMI?

2012-Jan-31 19:19:59 by gthain:
new nmi is 10.7
